article:
Once upon a time, there was an owl  in the middle of a dark forest. All the animals knew that he was the wisest among _ of them. So they often went to him and told him their problems. Then the owl always told them _ to solve their problems.
One day, a little bird came to the owl. She was _ .
"What's wrong with you?" asked the owl.
"I'm not happy at all, Mr. Owl . I don't want to be a bird any more. "the bird _ 
" Why don't you want to be a(n) _ ?" asked the owl.
"Because I am so small and weak, "she cried. "I want to be as big and strong as the lion. He is important, but I am not. "
Then the owl said _ in her ear. Then the bird dried her tears and _ away. One week later, the bird came back. "Thank you very much, Mr. Owl. You are so _ ,"she said to the owl. "I'm very happy now. Every day, I watch out for  lions and tigers. _ they come near, I shout as loudly as I can. Then they all run and hide. They often thank me for that. I am useful and important now. "
The wise owl smiled and said: "Dear, no one in the world is useless."
